text: As for the righteous, they will be in bliss (naʿīm).He said:The bliss of the elect among His servants who are the righteous (abrār) is the encounter (liqāʾ) with Him and the witnessing (mushāhada) of Him, just as their bliss in this world was in the witnessing (mushāhada) of Him and proximity (qurb) with Him. But God knows best.His words, Exalted is He:
